SL3

class pylie.SL3

Bases: pylie.numpy.base.MatrixLieGroup

An instantiation-free implementation of the SL3 matrix Lie group.

classmethod Exp(x)

Shortcut method: R^n to group directly.

\[\mathrm{Exp}: \mathbb{R}^n \to G\]
Parameters

x (np.ndarray or List[float] with size dof) – Vector of exponential coordinates.

Returns

Element of the group with shape (n,n).

Return type

np.ndarray

classmethod Log(X)

Shortcut method: group to R^n directly.

\[\mathrm{Log}: G \to \mathbb{R}^n\]
Parameters

X (np.ndarray with shape (n,n)) – Element of the group.

Returns

Vector of exponential coordinates with shape (n,1).

Return type

np.ndarray

static adjoint(H)

Adjoint representation of GROUP element. Obtained from Section 7.4 of Lie Groups for Computer Vision by Eade

static adjoint_algebra(xi)

Adjoint representation of ALGEBRA element.

Computes the Left Jacobian of SL(3) numerically.

Eliminates rounding errors: ensures matrix is proper group element.

static odot(p)

This expression helps obtain p^odot where Xi * p = p_odot * xi, and p is a vector of 3x1, usually representing position.

static random()
Returns

A random element of the group with shape (n,n).

Return type

np.ndarray

classmethod right_jacobian(x)

Group right jacobian evaluated at x in R^n. This is calculated from the left_jacobian() implementation using the fact that

\[\mathbf{J}_r(\mathbf{x}) = \mathbf{J}_\ell(-\mathbf{x})\]

which holds for all matrix Lie groups.

Parameters

x (np.ndarray or List[float] with size dof) –

Returns

The matrix \(\mathbf{J}_r(\mathbf{x})\) with shape (dof,dof).

Return type

np.ndarray

classmethod right_jacobian_inv(x)

Inverse of group right jacobian evaluated at x in R^n. This is calculated from the left_jacobian_inv() implementation using the fact that

\[\mathbf{J}_r^{-1}(\mathbf{x}) = \mathbf{J}_\ell^{-1}(-\mathbf{x})\]

which holds for all matrix Lie groups.

Parameters

x (np.ndarray or List[float] with size dof) –

Returns

The matrix :math: mathbf{J}_r^{-1}(mathbf{x})` with shape (dof,dof).

Return type

np.ndarray

static vee(X)

Vee operator \((\cdot)^\vee: \mathfrak{g} \to \mathbb{R}^n\).

Parameters

Xi (np.ndarray with shape (n,n)) – Element of the Lie algebra.

Returns

Vector with shape (n,1).

Return type

np.ndarray
